description: '''Allen West''' (born October 17, 1967, [[Brandon, Florida]], United States) is an American [[death metal]] [[guitarist]], who has been a member of [[Massacre (metal band)|Massacre]], [[Obituary (band)|Obituary]], [[Six Feet Under (band)|Six Feet Under]], Lowbrow, Corpse Rot, and Southwicked. He is considered to be a pioneering figure of the death metal genre in the 1980s.
